pages.text: Frilled Shark are small neutral sharks that appers at the bottom of deep oceans and feeds on Squid and Blobfish.$(br2)Don't stay close of them or they will attack you, inflicting Exsanguination effect, doing you an extra damage.$(br2)When left alone, they lure Squid with the shine of their teeth.
When attacking prey, they may to throw out a Serrated Shark Tooth. It can be use to craft a Shield of The Deep.
